name: Dual Apple Catch
description:
The game was created as part of the Global Game Jam 2022 (Theme: Duality).

It is a collaborative multiplayer game for two players where the goal is to collect as many as possible good (red: without dots and lines) apples in one run.

It is playable with only one mouse button, to make it easily accessible for many people. Apart from the multiplayer mode, there is also a singleplayer mode. The left player has to click in order to jump onto the button. When the button is pressed, the right player is catapulted upwards. He has to click in order to collect apples. Attention! Don´t collect the green ones (with points and lines)! They are poisonous!

Controls

Left Mouse-Button only
